statements: DELETE FROM on_chain_data WHERE amount > 1000 AND receiver_address = 'xyz789';
DELETE FROM OnChainData WHERE BlockNumber = 100 AND SenderAddress = '0xABC123'
DELETE FROM MarketInsights WHERE Timestamp = '2022-03-15 12:30:00' AND ActiveAddresses < 100
DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE id = 1001 AND amount < 1000.0;
DELETE FROM Blocks WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND num_transactions > 10;
DELETE FROM on_chain_data WHERE block_number = 1000 AND sender_address = '0x123456789'
DELETE FROM transaction_history WHERE receiver_address = '0x987654321' AND amount > 1000
DELETE FROM on_chain_transactions WHERE block_number = 100 AND from_address = '0x123456789abcdef' AND amount > 100.50;
DELETE FROM token_transactions WHERE amount <= 50.25 OR timestamp < '2022-01-01';
